message.content:
I need to identify and extract the line item and value of costs incurred to secure customer orders and to deliver goods and services to customers from the financial statement.

Looking at the income statement, costs related to securing customer orders and delivery of goods/services would typically be captured in "Selling Expenses" - these are the costs associated with marketing, sales, and distribution activities.

In the income statement provided, I can see:
- Selling Expenses: 14714.68

This is the line item that represents costs incurred to secure customer orders and deliver goods and services to customers.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '14714.68'} }
```
